001// Copyright (c) FIRST and other WPILib contributors.
002// Open Source Software; you can modify and/or share it under the terms of

004
005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command;
006
007import java.util.ArrayList;
008import java.util.List;
009
010/**
011 * A CommandGroups that runs a list of commands in sequence.
012 *
013 * <p>As a rule, CommandGroups require the union of the requirements of their component commands.
014 *
015 * <p>This class is provided by the NewCommands VendorDep
016 */
017public class SequentialCommandGroup extends CommandGroupBase {
018  private final List<Command> m_commands = new ArrayList<>();
019  private int m_currentCommandIndex = -1;
020  private boolean m_runWhenDisabled = true;
021
022  /**
023   * Creates a new SequentialCommandGroup. The given commands will be run sequentially, with the
024   * CommandGroup finishing when the last command finishes.
025   *
026   * @param commands the commands to include in this group.
027   */
028  public SequentialCommandGroup(Command... commands) {
029    addCommands(commands);
030  }
031
032  @Override
033  public final void addCommands(Command... commands) {
034    requireUngrouped(commands);
035
036    if (m_currentCommandIndex != -1) {
037      throw new IllegalStateException(
038          "Commands cannot be added to a CommandGroup while the group is running");
039    }
040
041    registerGroupedCommands(commands);
042
043    for (Command command : commands) {
044      m_commands.add(command);
045      m_requirements.addAll(command.getRequirements());
046      m_runWhenDisabled &= command.runsWhenDisabled();
047    }
048  }
049
050  @Override
051  public void initialize() {
052    m_currentCommandIndex = 0;
053
054    if (!m_commands.isEmpty()) {
055      m_commands.get(0).initialize();
056    }
057  }
058
059  @Override
060  public void execute() {
061    if (m_commands.isEmpty()) {
062      return;
063    }
064
065    Command currentCommand = m_commands.get(m_currentCommandIndex);
066
067    currentCommand.execute();
068    if (currentCommand.isFinished()) {
069      currentCommand.end(false);
070      m_currentCommandIndex++;
071      if (m_currentCommandIndex < m_commands.size()) {
072        m_commands.get(m_currentCommandIndex).initialize();
073      }
074    }
075  }
076
077  @Override
078  public void end(boolean interrupted) {
079    if (interrupted
080        && !m_commands.isEmpty()
081        && m_currentCommandIndex > -1
082        && m_currentCommandIndex < m_commands.size()) {
083      m_commands.get(m_currentCommandIndex).end(true);
084    }
085    m_currentCommandIndex = -1;
086  }
087
088  @Override
089  public boolean isFinished() {
090    return m_currentCommandIndex == m_commands.size();
091  }
092
093  @Override
094  public boolean runsWhenDisabled() {
095    return m_runWhenDisabled;
096  }
097
098  @Override
099  public SequentialCommandGroup beforeStarting(Command before) {
100    // store all the commands
101    var commands = new ArrayList<Command>();
102    commands.add(before);
103    commands.addAll(m_commands);
104
105    // reset current state
106    commands.forEach(CommandGroupBase::clearGroupedCommand);
107    m_commands.clear();
108    m_requirements.clear();
109    m_runWhenDisabled = true;
110
111    // add them back
112    addCommands(commands.toArray(Command[]::new));
113    return this;
114  }
115
116  @Override
117  public SequentialCommandGroup andThen(Command... next) {
118    addCommands(next);
119    return this;
120  }
121}
